title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Constructivist Application of Cloud and Mobile Computing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic cloud architecture concepts, mobile app development experience, and understanding of programming languages (Java/Python)
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement a mobile application deployment pipeline in a cloud environment.

Learners analyze three major security vulnerabilities in hybrid cloud environments (e.g., data leakage, privilege escalation, API vulnerabilities) through constructivist activities (case studies, simulations) and propose ≥2 mitigation strategies (encryption, access control, monitoring tools) per vulnerability.

Learners design a negotiation process for optimizing cloud resources (CPU, storage, network bandwidth) by selecting one platform (AWS/Azure/GCP) in a BYOD team project (4 members), and determine a plan achieving ≥80% team satisfaction within a $500 budget.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
